subject: Add Lisa-managed files section to CLAUDE.md template
description: Edit `all/copy-overwrite/CLAUDE.md` to insert the LISA-MANAGED FILES section after line 55 (after `Never update CHANGELOG`). Include both tables: files with local overrides and files/directories with no override. Verification: `grep -c "LISA-MANAGED FILES" all/copy-overwrite/CLAUDE.md` returns 1.
activeForm: Adding managed files section to CLAUDE.md
